full_text: You probably noticed the huge amounts of scam comments under my tweets. Impersonators (with planb hat, planb name etc), Airdrops, Giveaways, "Send 1 BTC get 10 back" etc etc. It's just too much. I can not report/block all. I trust you recognize the scammers and protect yourself!! https://t.co/WYvy5GAHQB
